subsection.name: SignServer 3.0 CentOS 4.4 Installation Guide
subsection.p: Installation guide describing step-by-step how to setup a SignServer cluster on CentOS 4.4. Even if the document is specific for this OS is should be quite easy to adopt it to other environments as well. It be downloaded here either as PDF or viewed as HTML

subsection.name: SignServer 2.0 CentOS 4.4 Installation Guide
subsection.p: Version 2.0 of the same documentation.PDF HTML
